sub_title: Sales and Customer Service | Customer Satisfaction | Marketing and Social Media | Event Planning and Management
summary:
I currently serve as a Sales Staff at Xenos November 2022, I have thrived in a dynamic customer-facing role, where my primary focus is on delivering exceptional service. My responsibilities include engaging with customers, offering valuable product insights and recommendations, and ensuring their utmost satisfaction and loyalty.
Prior to my tenure at Xenos, I embarked on an exciting journey as an English Tutor and Social Media Designer at Tia do Inglês, a highly regarded online platform dedicated to teaching English to eager Brazilian students. Over six enriching years, I honed my skills in crafting captivating and educational content across various digital platforms, including YouTube, Instagram, and Facebook. This experience allowed me to develop a deep understanding of effective online communication strategies and content creation techniques.
My true passion lies in helping individuals explore new languages and cultures. I believe in the power of communication as a tool for fostering understanding and unity among diverse communities. My creative and communication skills are dedicated to making a positive impact on the world.

profile_positions.description:
• Delivering Outstanding Customer Satisfaction: Consistently providing exceptional service to ensure every customer's needs are met and exceeded.
• Expert Product Knowledge: Demonstrating in-depth knowledge of the product range to offer informed assistance and product recommendations.
• Efficient Store Operations: Playing a pivotal role in maintaining the store's functionality by ensuring it is well-stocked, organized, and in a visually appealing condition.
• Effortless Merchandise Handling: Proficiently managing merchandise returns and exchanges, ensuring a seamless process for customers.
• Precise Inventory Management: Conducting meticulous inventory control to optimize stock levels and minimize discrepancies.
• Financial Accountability: Handling daily cash transactions with precision and accountability.
• Impeccable Store Hygiene: Upholding the highest standards of cleanliness and organization in stock areas, the store, and common spaces.
profile_positions.title: Sales Staff

profile_positions.description:
• Empowering Language Learners: Guided students through their English language journey, fostering their linguistic growth and proficiency.
• Customized Instruction: Tailored lessons to meet individual student needs, ensuring effective learning outcomes and progress.
• Engaging Content Creation: Developed innovative and engaging teaching materials, including videos, creative texts, subtitles, and other resources to enhance the learning experience.
• Effective Communication: Facilitated clear and concise communication in English, enabling students to build confidence in their language skills.
profile_positions.title: English Tutor

profile_positions.description:
• Strategic Social Media Planning: Orchestrated comprehensive social media strategies, leveraging insights and analytics to optimize online presence.
• Creative Content Crafting: Produced captivating and dynamic content across various mediums, including videos, imaginative text, engaging captions, compelling copywriting, and captivating stories.
• Headline Innovation: Collaborated in the development of attention-grabbing headlines for nuggets, stories, and other multimedia materials, enhancing content effectiveness.
• Trend Analysis and Strategic Planning: Conducted trend analysis and market research to inform data-driven strategies for social media communication, ensuring alignment with current trends and audience preferences.
profile_positions.title: Social Media Designer

profile_positions.description:
• Video Editing Excellence: Proficiently edited videos using industry-standard software, including Adobe Premiere and Sony Vegas Pro, to create engaging and visually appealing content.
• YouTube Platform Consultation: Provided expert guidance and consultation on various aspects related to the YouTube platform, offering insights and strategies to optimize content and channel performance.
• Creative Graphic Design: Produced eye-catching graphic designs for promotional purposes using Adobe Photoshop, enhancing visual branding and marketing efforts.
profile_positions.title: Video Editor

profile_positions.description:
• Comprehensive Training Management: Assumed responsibility for the meticulous planning, execution, and processing of internal training programs, catering to diverse hierarchical levels within the organization, including both virtual and in-person sessions.
• Holistic Training Support: Provided dedicated support throughout the entire training lifecycle, from pre-training preparation to post-training evaluations, ensuring the seamless development of employees at all levels.
profile_positions.title: Event Manager

profile_positions.description:
• End-to-End Logistics Oversight: Spearheaded the management of import and export processes, ensuring meticulous tracking, verification, and progress monitoring for a smooth and efficient flow of goods.
• Export Documentation Expertise: Expertly handled export documentation, including the requisition and processing of export funds, facilitating seamless international transactions.
• Process Optimization: Implemented strategic measures to enhance the efficiency of import and export operations, resulting in streamlined workflows and reduced lead times.
profile_positions.title: Import & Export Assist
